snippet: High in the hills of Palm Springs, in a John Lautner architectural wonder, Nicolas Ghesquière showed his cruise collection.
abstract: Nicolas Ghesquiere shows his cruise collection for Louis Vuitton at Bob and Dolores Hope Estate, architectural curiosity designed by John Lautner in Palm Springs, Calif.
lead_paragraph: High in the hills of Palm Springs, in a John Lautner architectural wonder, Nicolas Ghesquière showed his cruise collection.
